definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Sodium potassium tartrate and tartaric acid are osmotic laxatives.
sentences.chinese: 酒石酸及其钾盐是有渗透作用的泻剂。

sentences.english: In hot regions, extra tartaric acid is added to 'correct' the acidity.
sentences.chinese: 在热的地区，需加入额外的酒石酸来“纠正”酸度。

sentences.english: The content of tartaric acid also decreased.
sentences.chinese: 酒石酸的含量略有下降。

sentences.english: Colorimetry was used to measure the level of serum tartrate resistant acid phosphatase (TRACP).
sentences.chinese: 采用比色法测定血清抗酒石酸酸性磷酸酶水平。

sentences.english: Objectives To compare the efficacy of zolpidem tartrate and stilnox in the treatment for insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较酒石酸唑吡坦和思诺思片治疗失眠的疗效。
这些其实是酒石酸晶体。

sentences.english: Anionic tungstate complex was synthesized by reaction of tungstate with tartaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 由钨酸盐和酒石酸反应合成了钨阴离子配合物。

sentences.english: Mean of progenies tartaric acid content was lower than mean of parent value.
sentences.chinese: 杂交后代群体酒石酸含量平均值低于亲本平均值。

sentences.english: Sodium potassium tartrate and tartaric acid are osmotic laxatives .
sentences.chinese: 酒石酸及其钾盐是有渗透作用的泻剂。

sentences.english: This article studies the synthesis of sodium pyruvate from tartaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了酒石酸合成丙酮酸钠的工艺。

sentences.english: The contents of tea polyphenols in tea can be determined with ferrous tartrate colo…
sentences.chinese: 采用酒石酸亚铁比色法测定茶多酚含量。

definition: sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)
